pullRequest.title: fix: Restrict access to the METADATASTORE namespace
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add feature for admin user/ user with "ALL" authority to be able to read METADATASTORE namespace
Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes msvanaes@dhis2.org

commit.message:
fix: Restrict access to the METADATASTORE namespace

Add feature for admin user/ user with "ALL" authority to be able to read METADATASTORE namespace

Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes <msvanaes@dhis2.org>

nodes.bodyText: Should we either remove this or remove the commenting? Is the method not used?
Use ternary operator for more compact code.
